alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 4:39PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Millard...eastern Juab...southwestern Utah and southeastern Tooele Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 439 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles southwest of Elberta, or 24 miles west of Nephi, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Payson, Nephi, Delta, Santaquin, Rocky Ridge, Elberta, Spring Lake, West Mountain, Mona, Genola, Goshen, Eureka, Leamington, Lynndyl, Jericho, Tintic Junction and Little Sahara State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 212 and 249. US Route 6 between mile markers 89 and 160. US Route 50 between mile markers 90 and 91. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley
